alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Gilmer; Gordon; Murray; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Gilmer, southeastern Murray, eastern Gordon, northwestern Pickens and northeastern Bartow Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Fort Mountain State Park to near Calhoun, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Calhoun, Ellijay, East Ellijay, Fairmount, Ranger, Carters, Sonoraville, Tails Creek, Ramhurst, Redbud, Audubon, Conasauga Lake, Cherry Log, Mountaintown, Oakman, Fort Mountain State Park, Funkhouser, Nickelsville, and Roundtop. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
